s11 em1 10000 25

1.11 replace 0 with 1 as many times as possible in a line
s11 em1 11111 25
s12 em2 12111 24
s13 em3 11121 22
s14 em4 13111 23
s15 em5 19111 26
s16 em6 21111 25
s17 em7 25111 27
s18 em8 32111 28
